name: Culvert Repair
description: A critical utility or transit point; adventurers might sabotage, defend, or navigate the settlement through it.
atmosphere: The area is filled with the sound of flowing water and the metallic clang of repair work. The air carries the fresh scent of water and the sharp tang of metal tools. Workers move methodically through the confined space, while the atmosphere is one of essential maintenance and the hidden systems that keep the city functioning.
